## Cartesian3.multiplyByScalar() method

Multiplies the provided Cartesian componentwise by the provided scalar.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static multiplyByScalar(cartesian: Cartesian3, scalar: number, result?: Cartesian3): Cartesian3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cartesian | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | The Cartesian to be scaled. |
|  scalar | number | The scalar to multiply with. |
|  result | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md)

The modified result parameter.
